page.title: 12TINWALD TENNIS CLUB
page.content: Tinwald Tennis Club was originally started in the 1960's with the new court being thought of in 1979. Sir Hector Monro eventually opened the new court on Friday the 22nd of May 1981.The club now has thirty nine members-fifteen life members, fifteen full members and nine junior members. The fees are Â£25.00 for life membership;Â£5.00 per year for an adult and Â£2.50 anually per child. The club is extremely fortunate in that it has an all year round surface - one of only two in the country. As well as club members, the court is used by tourists and Amisfield school children.It has a c'ttee of seven members and raises money purely for the upkeep of the court and to pay a rent to the Tinwald Hall Committee on whose ground the court stands.
